"When <%me> and the others have returned to the Command Room, Zephetto summons his last reserves of strength to communicate through Faria's body. Zephetto tells them the truth about their greatest enemy, Vael, and what about happened between the ARKS and the Starless all those years ago. He apologizes for everything that has occurred, and entrusts the fate of the world to the people of Halpha."
